title: Analyze Equipment Selection
description: A planning engineer evaluates whether to purchase larger haul trucks for a new pit phase, considering both productivity benefits and capital cost.

tasks.description: Gather quotes for the new, larger haul trucks and their operating cost estimates.
tasks.expected_outcome: The capital and operating costs for the new fleet option are collected.

tasks.description: Run a haulage simulation to quantify the productivity benefits (e.g., lower cost per ton) of the larger trucks.
tasks.expected_outcome: The simulation shows a 15% reduction in cost per ton with the larger trucks.

tasks.description: Perform a financial analysis to compare the NPV of continuing with the current fleet versus investing in the new, larger fleet.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows that despite the high capital cost, the NPV is higher with the new fleet, and a recommendation to purchase is made.
